description: Hydrogen is a multiplatform program that emulates a drum machine based on patterns. You can create a pattern by adding various drum sounds, such as kicks, snare rimshots, and hat pedals, at various times in the pattern.

When you save a song by selecting Project â†’ Save As... , Hydrogen creates an H2SONG file to store the song information. After saving the file, you can close and re-open the song for further editing.
